trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Rio Linda
There were no other sightings in Rio Linda on or around December 6th 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving from work to home and was watching the clouds while at a stop sign when a formation of four round white disks roughly at 20,000 ft altitude with diameter of about 100 ft in formation of one and three wing shape (similar to US fighter formation) moved laterally into cloud then out and back into cloud. Being a former AF pilot, knew this could not be familiar aircraft at that speed or motion. I pulled over to try to get it on camera but it was too late. They seemed to stay in or behind the cloud. Many cumulus scattered clouds today.
Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
